svcproc.title: Intake Throttle Assembly
svcproc.para: The intake throttle assembly, a variable position actuator, restricts intake air flow to help heat the exhaust during aftertreatment regeneration. The intake throttle also restricts air flow for smooth engine shut down.
The intake throttle assembly changes valve position in response to Pulse Width Modulated (PWM) signals from the ECM.
The intake throttle assembly is mounted on the EGR and inlet air mixer duct on the intake side of the engine.
